about:
*About:*
*AudiosToTwitter v{0}*

Created by: [rogama25](https://twitter.com/rogama25)
With help from [IceWildcat](https://github.com/IceWildcat)

[Check the project's official site.](https://github.com/rogama25/AudiosToTwitter)

Report any bugs at [my GitHub repo](https://github.com/rogama25/audiosToTwitter/issues/new)

*With ❤️ from Spain*
attribute_missing: {0} is missing. Please set it before trying to start the bot.
audio_not_sent: Audio could not be sent. Please check that you can send DM to that user.
audio_sent: Audio sent. If you were replying to a Tweet, send "/cancel" to exit reply mode. Tweet text is now empty.
bot_linked_message:
Bot successfully linked. You can send me voice notes and I will Tweet them as a video or send me a link to a Tweet and then the voice note and I will tweet them as a reply to the specified Tweet.
You can also add text to the tweet using "/text <your text here>". To remove the text, just send that command with no text.
Send Direct messages with /dm <user>. @ is not needed.
bot_started: Bot successfully started. Do CTRL-C to stop.
bot_stopped: Bot stopped. It may be because you pressed CTRL-C or because an error occurred. Press enter.
download_ffmpeg: Do you want to download ffmpeg now? This will download around 60MiB of data. [y/n]
downloading_background: Background not found on disk. Downloading it, please wait...
ffmpeg_corrupt: ffmpeg zip file detected but it's corrupt. We'll have to download it again.
help:
Available commands:
· /text <text> - Sets the text for your next Tweet or DM.
· /dm <user> - Sends audios to a user through DM instead of posting Tweets. Sending no user or a nonexisting one will exit DM mode.
· Send a link to a Tweet and I'll reply to that one.
· /cancel - Exits reply mode and posts next audios as a normal Tweet.
· Send an audio or a music file and I will post that audio with the previous configurations. If the file is longer than 2:20 mins, it will be cut at that time.
· /help - Shows this help.
· /about - Shows the about page.
input_tg_key: Paste the new bot key (press enter to return without changing):
input_tw_access: Paste the new Twitter access token (press enter to ask for secret key without changing):
input_tw_access_secret: Paste the new Twitter access secret (press enter to return without changing):
input_tw_consumer: Paste the new Twitter consumer key (press enter to ask for secret key without changing):
input_tw_consumer_secret: Paste the new Twitter consumer secret (press enter to return without changing):
new_ffmpeg: New ffmpeg version available. Installed: {0} New version: {1}
now_replying:
Now replying to: @{0}: {1}
To post the audio as a tweet instead of a reply, send "/cancel"
register_key: Please send your bot the following code as a Telegram message: {0}
return_menu: Press enter to return to menu.
sending_dm: Sending DM to @{0}. Send /dm with no user to exit DM mode.
settings_corrupt: Settings file appears to be corrupt.
settings_info: Settings editor. Press the following numbers to edit settings.
telegram_notnumeric: Telegram ID was not a numeric and was not saved.
tweet_doesnt_exist: The tweet you sent seems to not exist.
unlink_tg: [{0}] Unlink Telegram bot from current user.
unlink_tg_confirm: Are you sure you want to unlink from the current Telegram user? Press y to unlink:
update_ffmpeg: Do you want to update ffmpeg now? This will download around 60MiB of data. [y/n]
voice_received: We received the voice note. Please wait a few seconds while we send it to Twitter. Please don't send me anything else until you receive a reply from me.
